sub_title: Graphic Designer | UI/UX | Event Design and production.
summary:
TWV NIET VEREIST

I see myself as a versatile and creative professional with a deep passion for music and design. As a Graphic Designer with a Masters in Marketing, I have experience in both agency and freelance work, and I thrive in both team leadership and on-site environments, such as events and concerts.

With over 10 years of experience as a creative director and partner, I have developed skills of successfully managing complex projects and improving internal processes for clients. My educational background in Architecture has also given me a deep understanding of space and structure, which I apply to my 3D renderings for interior design and event production.

Over the course of my 15-year career at an event production company, I have gained invaluable expertise in conceptualizing, designing, and producing all types of events, ranging from intimate weddings and corporate conferences to massive concerts for international artists like Chayanne, Ricardo Arjona, DJ Dimitri Vega & Like Mike, and more.

As a graphic designer, I am drawn to meticulous design, and I have developed a keen interest in the field of UX/UI design and the use of cutting-edge platforms like Figma. Additionally, I have been pursuing my passion for music by studying Audio Engineering at United Pop, which further enriches my ability to bring a unique creative perspective to all of my projects.

Overall, I am a versatile and dynamic creative professional who is committed to delivering exceptional results for my clients across all disciplines, whether in music or design.

And I can also play drums while speaking 😂🥁

education.degree_name: Maestría en Mercadeo y Publicidad con énfasis en creatividad

profile_positions.description:
As Head of Production and Design, my role is to oversee the design and production of all terminal boards for our clients. I am responsible for ensuring that each design meets our clients' exact brand specifications, and I work closely with them to provide guidance on effective communication for the boards.

My responsibilities include overseeing the entire production process, from ensuring that our team is well-stocked with necessary parts to programming and assigning each terminal to its respective client in a timely and efficient manner. I also take charge of quality control, ensuring that every design is approved by the client and that the boards are sent to production without any issues. I closely monitor each project's progress and take proactive measures to ensure that all client requirements are met, and every terminal is delivered on time.

In addition to my head of production responsibilities, I collaborate with our sales team to create designs that effectively communicate our products to potential clients. This involves designing infographics for email marketing campaigns and social media posts, as well as creating product mock-ups that can be used during sales pitches.

I also work closely with the development team to ensure that our UX/UI give a great experience to our clients and users.
profile_positions.title: Head of Production and Design

profile_positions.description:
As the Graphic designer for Moodus, I am responsible for ensuring that our clients' needs are met with fast and quality designs. Additionally, I have taken on the task of redesigning the Moodus Give Online platform, making it more user-friendly for both our customers and users who donate through the customer-integrated interface.

Through this redesign effort, I have implemented an intuitive UX/UI design that enables Moodus customers to easily create and publish their own donation landing pages independently. This will greatly improve the user experience for both our customers and donors, resulting in increased engagement and more successful fundraising campaigns.

With my design experience and dedication to delivering best results, I have played a pivotal role in enhancing the Moodus Give Online platform and empowering our customers to create and edit their own sites.
profile_positions.title: Graphic Designer

profile_positions.title: Freelance Graphic Designer

profile_positions.description:
As the Event Designer and Head Producer for America Productions in Honduras, I oversaw the successful planning, venue design, and production of major concerts and events.

From initial conception to final completion, I was involved in all phases of event organization, meticulously ensuring that all policies and procedures were fully followed to guarantee a seamless and memorable experience for attendees.

I also served as the primary point of contact for clients, maintaining 100% communication throughout the event planning process. By listening carefully to their needs and goals, I effectively negotiated contract terms and delivered successful outcomes that exceeded their expectations.

As a team leader, I managed large groups of professionals for every event, ensuring that they were equipped with the tools and resources necessary to achieve optimal results. Additionally, I served as a liaison between the company and vendors, building positive relationships that ensured smooth operations and excellent execution.

In addition to my responsibilities, I also identified and communicated with sponsors, completing professional reports and presentations, and developing and implementing their requirements to create a truly exceptional event experience.

Some of the events I produced in Honduras are Dimitri Vegas and Like Mike, Chayanne, Mocedades and Armando Manzanero.
profile_positions.title: Event Producer

profile_positions.description:
As a founder and partner of the company, I took on a leadership role in client relationships, serving as their primary point of contact throughout the project lifecycle. In this capacity, I successfully negotiated favorable terms, carefully identified their needs, and maintained open lines of communication to ensure their satisfaction with the final product.

Additionally, I provided crucial direction and guidance as the UX|UI designer, utilizing my extensive knowledge and experience in design to create highly intuitive, visually stunning interfaces that helped set our apps apart from the competition. By prioritizing the user experience, I ensured that our products were not only functional but also enjoyable to use, helping to build customer loyalty and drive positive outcomes for the company.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder / App design

profile_positions.description:
Creative Director for BLÜ Nicaragua and Click Marketing

• In charge of large teams and head production for important events in large, medium and small venues for clients such as Movistar, Claro Nicaragua, Mercon, Camel, Western Union.

Day to day management of a large design department and coordinating various production elements for events and concerts.
profile_positions.title: Creative Director

volunteer_experiences.description:
• Graphic Design of Moodus boards for clients.
• Web Design - UX|UI design for Moodus Online.
• Moodus Terminal Assembly.
• Moodus Terminal packing for shipping.

- Redesign in SketchUp of the office layout to take advantage of every space available for sitting, meetings,  product assembly and product packaging.

• Conceptualization and design for various events about the social political crisis in Nicaragua.
• Team work with other Nicaraguan asylum seekers for the organization of an online concert during the Covid-19 pandemic.
• Coordinating the contacts in Nicaragua such as Comunica tus Ideas for the organization and streaming of the online concert.
• Coordinating teams in Nicaragua to buy and distribute health goods to hospitals, clinics and public. 
• Coordinating the payment of the health goods between providers and the fund management team.

During the COVID 19 outbreak I volunteered as a shopping cart cleaner. Every cart that was used by clients needed to be thoroughly cleansed for the safety of the next client.

These measures where in place to diminish virus contagion.
